entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
